verses.verse: It happened in the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> because Tyre <S%H6865><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> against Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> Aha, <S%H1889><s%> she is broken: <S%H7665><s%> the gate <S%H1817><s%> of the peoples; <S%H5971><s%> she is turned <S%H5437><s%> to me; <S%H4390><s%> I shall be replenished, now that she is laid waste: <S%H2717><s%>

therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H6865><s%> I am against you, Tyre, and will cause many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> to come up <S%H5927><s%> against you, <S%H3220><s%> as the sea causes its waves <S%H1530><s%> to come up. <S%H5927><s%>

They shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> and break down <S%H2040><s%> her towers: <S%H4026><s%> I will also scrape <S%H5500><s%> her dust <S%H6083><s%> from her, <S%H5414><s%> and make her a bare <S%H6706><s%> rock. <S%H5553><s%>

She shall be a place for the spreading <S%H4894><s%> of nets <S%H2764><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%> for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3069><s%> and she shall become a spoil <S%H957><s%> to the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
Her daughters <S%H1323><s%> who are in the field <S%H7704><s%> shall be slain <S%H2026><s%> with the sword: <S%H2719><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H935><s%> I will bring on Tyre <S%H6865><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of kings, <S%H4428><s%> from the north, <S%H6828><s%> with horses, <S%H5483><s%> and with chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and with horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> and a company, <S%H6951><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

He shall kill <S%H2026><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> with the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and he shall make <S%H5414><s%> forts <S%H1785><s%> against you, <S%H8210><s%> and cast up a mound <S%H5550><s%> against you, <S%H6965><s%> and raise up the buckler against you. <S%H6793><s%>

He shall set <S%H5414><s%> his battering <S%H6904><s%> engines <S%H4239><s%> against your walls, <S%H2346><s%> and with his axes <S%H2719><s%> he shall break down <S%H5422><s%> your towers. <S%H4026><s%>

By reason of the abundance <S%H8229><s%> of his horses <S%H5483><s%> their dust <S%H80><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> you: <S%H2346><s%> your walls shall shake <S%H7493><s%> at the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> and of the wagons, <S%H1534><s%> and of the chariots, <S%H7393><s%> when he shall enter <S%H935><s%> into your gates, <S%H8179><s%> as men enter <S%H3996><s%> into a city <S%H5892><s%> in which is made a breach. <S%H1234><s%>

With the hoofs <S%H6541><s%> of his horses <S%H5483><s%> shall he tread down <S%H7429><s%> all your streets; <S%H2351><s%> he shall kill <S%H2026><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> with the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and the pillars <S%H4676><s%> of your strength <S%H5797><s%> shall go down <S%H3381><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

They shall make a spoil <S%H7997><s%> of your riches, <S%H2428><s%> and make a prey <S%H962><s%> of your merchandise; <S%H7404><s%> and they shall break down <S%H2040><s%> your walls, <S%H2346><s%> and destroy <S%H5422><s%> your pleasant <S%H2532><s%> houses; <S%H1004><s%> and they shall lay <S%H7760><s%> your stones <S%H68><s%> and your timber <S%H6086><s%> and your dust <S%H6083><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the waters. <S%H4325><s%>
I will cause the noise <S%H1995><s%> of your songs <S%H7892><s%> to cease; <S%H7673><s%> and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of your harps <S%H3658><s%> shall be no more heard. <S%H8085><s%>

I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a bare <S%H6706><s%> rock; <S%H5553><s%> you shall be a place <S%H4894><s%> for the spreading <S%H4894><s%> of nets; <S%H2764><s%> you shall be built <S%H1129><s%> no more: <S%H3068><s%> for I Yahweh have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. <S%H136><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> to Tyre: <S%H6865><s%> shall not the islands <S%H339><s%> shake <S%H7493><s%> at the sound <S%H6963><s%> of your fall, <S%H4658><s%> when the wounded <S%H2491><s%> groan, <S%H602><s%> when the slaughter <S%H2027><s%> is made <S%H2026><s%> in the midst of you? <S%H8432><s%>

Then all the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> from their thrones, <S%H3678><s%> and lay aside <S%H5493><s%> their robes, <S%H4598><s%> and strip off <S%H6584><s%> their embroidered <S%H7553><s%> garments: <S%H899><s%> they shall clothe <S%H3847><s%> themselves with trembling; <S%H2731><s%> they shall sit <S%H3427><s%> on the ground, <S%H776><s%> and shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> every moment, <S%H7281><s%> and be astonished at you. <S%H8074><s%>

They shall take up <S%H5375><s%> a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> over you, <S%H559><s%> and tell you, <S%H6><s%> How you are destroyed, who were inhabited <S%H3427><s%> by seafaring men, <S%H3220><s%> the renowned <S%H1984><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> who was strong <S%H2389><s%> in the sea, <S%H3220><s%> she and her inhabitants, <S%H3427><s%> who caused <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> to be on all who lived there! <S%H3427><s%>

Now shall the islands <S%H339><s%> tremble <S%H2729><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your fall; <S%H4658><s%> yes, <S%H339><s%> the islands that are in the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be dismayed <S%H926><s%> at your departure. <S%H3318><s%>

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> When I shall make <S%H5414><s%> you a desolate <S%H2717><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> like the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are not inhabited; <S%H3427><s%> when I shall bring up <S%H5927><s%> the deep <S%H8415><s%> on you, <S%H7227><s%> and the great waters <S%H4325><s%> shall cover you; <S%H3680><s%>

then will I bring you down <S%H3381><s%> with those who descend <S%H3381><s%> into the pit, <S%H953><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> of old time, <S%H5769><s%> and will make you to dwell in the lower parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> in the places <S%H8482><s%> that are desolate <S%H2723><s%> of old, <S%H5769><s%> with those who go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit, <S%H953><s%> that you be not inhabited; <S%H3427><s%> and I will set <S%H5414><s%> glory <S%H6643><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living: <S%H2416><s%>

I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a terror, <S%H1091><s%> and you shall no more have any being; <S%H1245><s%> though you are sought for, yet you will never <S%H5769><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> again, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
